reviewText: The DVD would not play on my blue-ray and when I learned it was formatted only for European DVD players, I returned it.  Apparently the DVD's for this video and the movie The Red Shoes made in the UK are all types that do not play in the US.  At the time I ordered it this information was not given on the Amazon site.
Be careful when wanting to order foreign DVDs.  This particular one is for Region 2 -- not for US.  I had to return it.
